24000001.additional_information: On December 14, 2023, an extraordinary general meeting was held where Mr. EL AKILI IDRISS resigned as manager, and Mr. EL AKILI IMAD was appointed as administrator for an indefinite period. Additionally, 35 shares were transferred to Mrs. EL AKILI MAJDA by various individuals including Mr. EL AKILI IDRISS, Mrs. PITUL SIMONA, and Mrs. MOUSTAOUDDI SALIMA.

24000002.additional_information: On 11/12/2023, during an extraordinary general meeting of QUICK ENTREPRISE, the following decisions were made: Mr. ZULFIQAR Ahmed Malik was appointed as an Administrator, effective from 11/12/2023; Mr. ASGHAR Muhammad resigned from his position as Administrator, effective from 11/12/2023; the company's registered office was moved to Chaussée denghien 294, 1480 Tubize.

24000003.additional_information: On November 1, 2023, during the extraordinary general assembly, Mr. KHALID Muhammad was appointed as an administrator, and Mr. ASGHAR Muhammad resigned from his position as administrator at the SRL YDE GROUP.

24000004.additional_information: On the extraordinary general meeting held on 01/09/2023, the shareholders of BRUSSEL SHOP decided to transfer the registered office to Chaussée d'Ixelles 25, 1050 Ixelles starting from 01/09/2023. Following the transfer of shares, the new distribution is as follows: Mr. BALOCH Bakhtyar owns 99/100 shares, Mr. FAZAL Karim owns 1/100 shares, and Mr. HUSSANI Naqibullah owns no shares. The session concluded after the reading of the minutes. Mr. FAZAL Karim is noted as an administrator.

document_purpose: Modification of the registered office address
24000005.additional_information: The document details the decisions made in an extraordinary general meeting held on December 13, 2023. Tresor Madoda Tuyinama, the manager, received the administrative decision to change the registered office address from 209 Boulevard Lambermont, Box 12, 1030 Schaerbeek to 54 Avenue Louise, 1050 Ixelles. All resolutions were unanimously approved, giving full powers to the administrator for necessary modifications and publication.

24000006.additional_information: The document pertains to the extraordinary general meeting held on November 7, 2023, where the extension of director mandates for François Hublot, Jean-Marie Lefevre, and the French company BIOCODEX (represented by Nicolas Coudurier) was unanimously confirmed. These mandates began on January 1, 2023, and are set to end after the 2026 general meeting. François Hublot is reappointed as a delegated director with a mandate ending in 2026. The annual general meeting on May 9, 2023, unanimously renewed the audit mandate for SRL CDP Petit & Co, represented by Benjamin Gorlier, for three years. The board also unanimously empowered SRL Bofidi Accountants or their representatives, including Lindsey Schamp, Wendy Defreyne, Sylvia Vanbeveren, Eva Thielemans, and Tine Talpe, to act on behalf of the company in legal and administrative matters.

document_purpose: Adoption of new statutes in accordance with the Code of Companies and Associations
24000007.additional_information: An Extraordinary General Assembly was held on December 15, 2023, during which it was decided to adopt and revise the statutes to comply with the Code of Companies and Associations. The company is a general partnership with its headquarters in the Brussels-Capital Region. It engages in construction and civil engineering activities in Belgium and abroad.

document_purpose: Nomination, Resignation, and Transfer of Shares
24000008.additional_information: On December 15, 2023, at 16:00, an extraordinary general meeting was held at the headquarters of LOLA & BILLY SRL, located at Avenue Wielmans Ceupens 173-175, BtO, 1190 Brussels. Present were MADAME Jalil Najet, Monsieur Jalil Kalid, and Monsieur El Marnissi M'Hamed Bilal. During the meeting, Monsieur Jalil Kalid transferred 5 shares to El Marnissi M'Hamed Bilal. After this transfer, MADAME Jalil Najet holds 95 shares and El Marnissi M'Hamed Bilal holds 5 shares. Monsieur Jalil Kalid resigned as administrator as of December 31, 2023, and El Marnissi M'Hamed Bilal will become an administrator starting January 1, 2024. The meeting concluded at 16:30.

document_purpose: Renewal of the Board of Directors
24000009.additional_information: The extraordinary general meeting held on October 2, 2023, at 7:00 PM, decided unanimously to appoint as directors Mr. Jean Simons, Mrs. Brigitte Schrurs, and Mrs. Madeleine Simons. The meeting took place at the company's headquarters on Avenue Sleeckx, 1030 Schaerbeek. The mandates will be for a duration of 3 years starting from this day and will be served without compensation. The meeting was adjourned at 7:30 PM.

document_purpose: Renewal of the Board of Directors
24000010.additional_information: An extraordinary general meeting held on October 2, 2023, at 3:00 PM at the company's headquarters decided unanimously to appoint Jean Simons, Brigitte Schrurs, and Madeleine Simons as directors. The mandates will last for 3 years from this date and will be unpaid. The meeting concluded at 3:30 PM.
